items.desc: Implements the core logic of a property delegate for a read/write property that calls callback functions when changed.

items.text: fun interface PropertyDelegateProvider<in T, out D>
items.desc: Base interface that can be used for implementing property delegate providers.

items.text: fun interface ReadOnlyProperty<in T, out V>
items.desc: Base interface that can be used for implementing property delegates of read-only properties.

items.text: interface ReadWriteProperty<in T, V> : ReadOnlyProperty<T, V>
items.desc: Base interface that can be used for implementing property delegates of read-write properties.
